full_text: Knitted hat in 1 strand DROPS Fiesta and 2 strands DROPS Kid silk. The piece is worked bottom up. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ See the RAINBOW REACH MITTENS pattern here ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #rainbowreachhat DROPS Design: Pattern fs-036 Yarn group B + A + A SIZES : S/M - L/XL Fits head-size: 54/56 - 58/60 cm YARN : DROPS FIESTA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 150-150 g colour 22, Fairytale And use: DROPS KID-SILK from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group A) 150-150 g colour 56, Marzipan NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 5.5 MM: Length 40 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 5.5 MM. KNITTING TENSION : 15 stitches in width and 20 rows in height with stocking stitch and 3 strands on needle size 5.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
name: Ravelry: 261-17 Rainbow Reach Hat pattern by DROPS design
